statements: SELECT * FROM ppc_ad_performance
SELECT ad_name, clicks, cost FROM ppc_ad_performance WHERE clicks > 100
SELECT ad_name, impressions FROM ppc_ad_performance ORDER BY impressions DESC
SELECT ad_name, device_type FROM ppc_ad_performance WHERE device_type = 'mobile'
SELECT ad_name, cost FROM ppc_ad_performance WHERE cost < 50 ORDER BY cost
SELECT ad_name, clicks, cost FROM ppc_ad_performance WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY cost DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT ad_name, impressions, cost FROM ppc_ad_performance WHERE impressions < 500 AND device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY impressions ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, clicks, cost FROM ppc_ad_performance WHERE cost BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00 ORDER BY clicks DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, impressions, cost FROM ppc_ad_performance WHERE device_type = 'Desktop' AND clicks >= 50 ORDER BY ad_id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, clicks, cost FROM ppc_ad_performance WHERE cost > 200.00 AND device_type = 'Tablet' ORDER BY clicks ASC, cost DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_data WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks FROM ad_performance_data WHERE conversions > 0;
SELECT ad_name, device_type FROM ad_performance_data ORDER BY ad_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(impressions), AVG(clicks), AVG(conversions) FROM ad_performance_data;
SELECT ad_name, device_name FROM ad_performance_data JOIN device_types ON ad_performance_data.device_type = device_types.device_name;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, impressions FROM ad_performance_data WHERE device_type='Desktop';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM device_types WHERE device_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT ad_name, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance_data WHERE ad_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND impressions > 100 ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, device_type FROM ad_performance_data WHERE impressions BETWEEN 50 AND 200 AND conversions < 5 ORDER BY ad_id ASC, device_type DESC;
SELECT ad_name, clicks FROM ad_performance_data WHERE device_type LIKE '%obile%' AND clicks > 20 ORDER BY clicks DESC, ad_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ppc_ad_performance
SELECT ad_id, device_type, clicks FROM ppc_ad_performance
SELECT impressions, clicks, device_type FROM ppc_ad_performance ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT * FROM ppc_ad_devices WHERE device_category = 'Mobile'
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM ppc_ad_segments
SELECT ad_id, device_type, clicks, impressions FROM ppc_ad_performance WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY impressions DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_category FROM ppc_ad_devices WHERE device_category = 'Mobile' ORDER BY device_name ASC
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM ppc_ad_segments WHERE segment_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY segment_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT ad_id, clicks FROM ppc_ad_performance WHERE ad_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_category FROM ppc_ad_devices ORDER BY device_id
SELECT * FROM device_performance;
SELECT ad_id, impressions, clicks FROM device_performance WHERE conversions > 0;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_data WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, budget FROM ad_data ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) as device_count FROM device_type GROUP BY device_name ORDER BY device_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_performance WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY conversions DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ad_name, budget FROM ad_data INNER JOIN campaign_data ON ad_data.campaign_id = campaign_data.campaign_id WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Campaign' AND budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_data WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks FROM ad_data WHERE ad_type = 'Video' AND budget < 1000 ORDER BY impressions DESC;

SELECT device_name, ad_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM device_type INNER JOIN ad_data ON device_type.device_id = ad_data.ad_id INNER JOIN device_performance ON ad_data.ad_id = device_performance.ad_id WHERE device_name = 'Mobile' AND clicks >= 50 ORDER BY conversions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ad_name, clicks, impressions FROM ads_ad_performance;
SELECT ad_id, cost FROM ads_ad_performance WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT * FROM ad_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_category FROM ad_devices WHERE device_category = 'Mobile';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ads_ad_performance;
SELECT ad_name, clicks, impressions FROM ads_ad_performance WHERE clicks > 100 AND impressions < 500;
SELECT ad_name, cost FROM ads_ad_performance ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT ad_name, device_type, clicks, impressions, cost FROM ads_ad_performance INNER JOIN ad_devices ON ads_ad_performance.device_type = ad_devices.device_name;
SELECT ad_name, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ads_ad_performance INNER JOIN ad_campaigns ON ads_ad_performance.ad_id = ad_campaigns.campaign_id WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
